title: Vox Dei
author: Scott, Thomas, 1580?-1626.
publisher: Printed by I.L. for Richard Rounthwait,
notes: Attributed to Scott by NUC pre-1956 imprints and STC (2nd ed.)
Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Anti-Catholic sermon urging England to go to war against Spain.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
